options_page_header_2.description: Name of extension in navigation sidebar

options_tab_whitelist.description: Sidebar tab label and main heading inside corresponding tab

options_tab_advanced.description: Sidebar tab label and main heading inside corresponding tab

options_tab_contribute.description: Button in navigation sidebar to support Adblock Plus

options_readMore.description: Read more element that shows tooltip with description

options_blocking_title.description: Blocking section name in General tab

options_language_title.description: Ad blocking list option name in General tab

options_language_title_tooltip_1.description: Top part of tooltip description for 'Adblocking' section in General tab
options_language_title_tooltip_1.message: The default filter list is based on your browser's language settings. If you live in Germany, your default filter list is German+English. However, if you live in Germany and frequently visit Italian websites, you need to subscribe to the Italian filter list. To maintain optimal performance, it is recommended to select only the language that you need.

options_language_title_tooltip_notes_1.description: First bottom part of tooltip description for 'Adblocking' section in General tab
options_language_title_tooltip_notes_1.message: Consider: Sometimes ads appear because your filter lists are not up to date. If this is the case, it's recommended to manually update all your filter lists. You can do that by going to Advanced > Update all filter lists.

options_language_title_tooltip_notes_2.description: Second bottom part of tooltip description for 'Adblocking' section in General tab
options_language_title_tooltip_notes_2.message: If you still see ads, please report them in our Adblock Plus sub-forum under Help > Forum > Filters for Adblock Plus.

options_language_add.description: Add other language button in General Tab

options_more_title.description: Blocking list option name in General tab

options_more_title_tooltip_1.description: Tooltip description for 'More blocking options' section in General tab
options_more_title_tooltip_1.message: By default, Adblock Plus blocks all annoying ads, including video ads, animated ads, noisy ads, flashy banners, pop-ups, pop-unders and much more. In addition to ads, Adblock Plus can also block tracking, malware, social media buttons and more to increase your safety and privacy online.

options_more_add.description: Button name for adding other filter list in General tab

options_more_anti-adblock_tooltip_1.message: The Adblock Warning Removal List removes obtrusive messages and warnings targeted to users who use an adblocker.

options_more_malware_tooltip_1.message: Increase your protection against malware, viruses, Trojan horses, worms, spyware, adware and more.

options_more_malware_tooltip_2.message: If your computer is slow at startup or riddled with pop-ups, it may be infected with malware. Computers infected with malware are vulnerable to all kinds of cyber attacks, including stolen identity. Infected computers can also be used to send spam emails or attack other computers or servers, stealing passwords, social security numbers, personal documents and credit card information.

options_more_privacy_tooltip_1.message: Adblock Plus can disable tracking (e.g. from ad agencies) to further protect your privacy on the web.

options_more_privacy_tooltip_2.message: Companies such as ad agencies are tracking your online activity and browsing history every time you surf the web. According to Stanford University research, Adblock Plus is the most efficient solution available against third-party tracking companies.

options_more_privacy_tooltip_notes_1.message: Note that this feature may conflict with Acceptable Ads, which allows some nonintrusive ads to be displayed, as well as the tracking that is needed to measure the performance of those ads. This is necessary because some websites only earn revenue from ads if their impact can be measured.

options_more_social_tooltip_1.message: Adblock Plus can disable social media buttons on websites, ensuring that social networks can't create a profile based on the websites you visit.

options_more_social_tooltip_2.message: Buttons used to share content on social media platforms such as Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus and others are placed on almost every website that you visit. Even if you don't click them, these buttons send requests to the servers of the social network which use information to create a profile based on your browsing habits.

options_exceptions_title.description: Exceptions section name in General tab

options_acceptableAds_title.description: Acceptable ads option name in General tab

options_acceptableAds_title_tooltip_1.description: First part of tooltip description for 'Acceptable Ads' section in General tab
options_acceptableAds_title_tooltip_1.message: Since many websites rely on advertising revenue, we encourage the use of noninstrusive advertising.

options_acceptableAds_title_tooltip_2.description: Second part of tooltip description for 'Acceptable Ads' section in General tab
options_acceptableAds_title_tooltip_2.message: The Acceptable Ads initiative, which supports both users and website owners, is a set of strict guidelines that identifies acceptable ads. Ads meeting these criteria are displayed to users.

options_acceptableAds_title_tooltip_3.description: Third part of tooltip description for 'Acceptable Ads' section in General tab
options_acceptableAds_title_tooltip_3.message: You can, however, disable this feature at any time and browse ad-free.

options_acceptableAds_description.description: Acceptable ads descriptive name in General tab

options_whitelist_description.message: You've turned off ad blocking on these websites. You will see ads on these websites.

options_whitelist_empty_1.message: You aren't whitelisting any websites yet.

options_whitelist_empty_2.message: Websites you trust and want to allow ads on will be shown here.

options_whitelist_duplicate.description: Duplicate hostname warning of whitelist text input

options_whitelist_description.message: You've turned off ad blocking on these websites. You will see ads on these websites.

options_advanced_description.message: Customize Adblock Plus, add or remove filter lists, create and maintain your own filter lists

options_customize_blockElement.description: Option label of customize section in Advanced tab

options_customize_blockElement_tooltip_1.description: Tooltip text for Show 'Block element' option item of customize section in Advanced tab
options_customize_blockElement_tooltip_1.message: Temporarily block annoying items on a webpage, e.g. images or animated slideshows.

options_customize_showDevToolsPanel.description: Option label of customize section in Advanced tab
options_customize_showDevToolsPanel.message: Show 'Adblock Plus' panel in the developer tools

options_customize_showDevToolsPanel_tool.description: Tooltip text for Show 'Adblock Plus' panel option item of customize section in Advanced tab
options_customize_showDevToolsPanel_tool.message: View blocked and whitelisted items from your browser's developer tools panel.

options_customize_showNotifications.description: Option label of customize section in Advanced tab

options_customize_showNotifications_tool.description: Tooltip text for Show notifications option item of customize section in Advanced tab
options_customize_showNotifications_tool.message: Turn off all notifications from Adblock Plus.

options_filterList_description.description: Filter lists section description in Advanced tab
options_filterList_description.message: Each Adblock Plus setting functions because of a filter list. Below are the corresponding filter lists to all your Adblock Plus settings. You can also add additional filters created and maintained by our trusted community. Learn more.
